text: Nabiyow cus: Qhiyaamah ayróy koros kee jinni sheytoonay ken awlaytiitih tani Yalli inkih edde maagoysa ayró, jinni Buttay isin Nummah seehadak maggo mara makkoosseeniih maxqawissen keenik iyya Yalli, seehadak ken awlaytiitih tan koros Ni- Rabbow nee kee ginnik mariiy marat satta iyyeeh yintifiqeeh atu addunyâ manol neh xagte wakti yumurruqeeh noofeh iyyan, Yalli keenik iyyah: gira siinik orbeynaay siinik madaba isin teetil waarak, Yalla inkittoysak suge umamaray ku-Rabbi giral waaram kah faxe weey Sarra isi Racmatah girak yayyaaquwaa akke waytek, diggah ku-Rabbi naggaara isi naqoosah caagid yaaxigi kinni
